level.heading: SOLICITATIONS FOR INFORMATION AND PLANNING PURPOSES (ยง 27-1601)

level.text: When information necessary for planning purposes cannot be obtained from potential sources by more economical and less formal means, the contracting officer may use a solicitation for information or planning.
A request for information (RFI) shall include the following:
A description of the information to be furnished in the response;
An indication of whether the notice will be followed by a conference and a formal solicitation; and
A request that parties interested in the contemplated procurement respond by a specified date.
The contracting officer shall safeguard all information received in response to an RFI from unauthorized disclosure.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1446 (February 26, 1988); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1136 (February 1, 2013).
